Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.
Disrupt the Orbital Relay network of the target player, blocking their use of Orbital Relays for {Duration}[turn/]
干扰目标玩家的轨道中继站网络，阻止其使用轨道中继站，持续 {Duration}[turn/]
Our agents successfully hacked the enemy's Orbital Relay network undetected and blocked their use of it for a few turns.
我们的特工成功入侵了敌方轨道中继站网络，并在没有被发现的情况下在几个回合内阻止了他们使用。
Our agents successfully hacked the enemy's Orbital Relay network and blocked their use of it, but they were detected at the last moment! Unfortunately, the enemy is aware of our involvement.
我们的特工成功入侵了敌方轨道中继站网络并，但他们在最后关头被敌人发现了！很不幸，敌人已知晓我们参与其中。
Our agents failed to disrupt the Orbital Relay network, but were able to make a clean escape. Though the enemy surely knows something is afoot, they do not know of our direct involvement.
我们的特工在入侵敌方轨道中继站网络时失败了，但他们成功地逃离了出来。即使敌人知道有些事情正在进行，也无从知晓我们直接参与其中。
Our agents failed to disrupt the Orbital Relay network and their attempt was detected! Unfortunately, the enemy is aware of our involvement.
我们的特工在入侵敌方轨道中继站网络时失败了，并且被敌人发现了！很不幸，敌人已知晓我们参与其中。

Hostile agents have successfully hacked into our Orbital Relay network and disrupted the navigational data! It will take us {Duration}[turn/] to get systems back online. Until then, our Orbital Relays will be disabled. Our counterintelligence has successfully determined who was behind this incursion.
敌方特工入侵了我们的轨道中继站网络并破坏了导航数据！我们需要花费 {Duration}[turn/] 使系统重新上线。在那之前，我们的轨道中继站将无法使用。我们的反间谍系统已经成功确定了这次入侵的主谋。

Unknown hostile agents have successfully hacked into our Orbital Relay network and disrupted the navigational data! It will take us {Duration}[turn/] to get systems back online. Until then, our Orbital Relays will be disabled.
未知敌方特工入侵了我们的轨道中继站网络并破坏了导航数据！我们需要花费 {Duration}[turn/] 使系统重新上线。在那之前，我们的轨道中继站将无法使用。

Our counterintelligence caught some hostile agents who were attempting to disrupt the Orbital Relay navigational network! Their disruption of the Relays has failed, and we have successfully determined the mastermind behind the incursion.
我们的反间谍系统抓住了几个正在破坏我们轨道中继站导航网络的敌方特工！他们的阴谋失败了，而且我们成功确定了这次入侵的主谋。

Our counterintelligence found some hostile agents who were attempting to disrupt the Orbital Relay navigational network. Their disruption of the Relays has failed, but the insurgents managed to make their escape before our agents could catch them.
我们的反间谍系统发现了几个正在破坏我们轨道中继站导航网络的敌方特工。他们的阴谋失败了，但是这些入侵者在我们的特工抓住他们之前逃走了。
Use the Reality Gate to deploy {echoWalkers} copies of target friendly non-Hero unit.
使用现实之门部署 {echoWalkers} 个目标友方非英雄单位的镜像副本。
changed to say that it copies target unit twice

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
changed to say that it copies target unit twice
